# <code>arg-min</code> for dataframe

<div class='command-title'>Return index for min value in series</div>

## Signature

```> arg-min```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Returns index for min value
```shell
  > [1 3 2] | into df | arg-min
```
